author: Special Correspondent
text:
A student from Andhra Pradesh is feared to have drowned at sea following New Year celebrations on the Marina beach.

According to police sources, Manoharan (19), along with three of his friends from his Polytechnic, visited the beach on Friday. When he went missing, his friends informed the police. The police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: Polytechnic student goes missing at sea
